title: Convenient Cabinet Action
file_description:
Added several cabinet actions, each unlocked by different technologies from Era 1 to Era 5. Please check the specific unlocking technologies in the game.

Currently, it has been changed so that AI cannot use these cabinet actions.

Integrate Region — Era 3 — Integrate all locations in a region at the normal speed
Integrate Region Efficiently — Era 4 — Integrate all locations in a region at three times the speed
Nationwide Increase Control — Era 2 — Increase control over all locations nationwide
Nationwide Increase Control Efficiently — Era 4 — Rapidly increase control over all locations nationwide
Nationwide Conversion — Era 2 — Increase the conversion speed of all locations nationwide
Nationwide Conversion Efficiently — Era 4 — Rapidly increase the conversion speed of all locations nationwide
Nationwide Assimilation — Era 2 — Increase the assimilation speed of all locations nationwide
Nationwide Assimilation Efficiently — Era 3 — Rapidly increase the assimilation speed of all locations nationwide
Theological Education — Era 1 — Slightly increase research speed
Scientific Research — Era 2 — Increase research speed
Early Modern Scientific Research — Era 4 — Greatly increase research speed
Promote Fertility — Era 1 — Slightly increase national population growth speed
Promote Fertility Efficiently — Era 3 — Greatly increase national population growth speed

Additionally, the Integrate Area cabinet action has been moved up to Era 2.

——————————
12.27 New Cabinet Actions
Vassal Diplomacy — Era 2 — Improve relations and annexation speed with all vassals
Efficient Vassal Diplomacy — Era 4 — Greatly improves relations and annexation speed with all vassals
Goodwill Diplomacy — Era 2 — Increases diplomatic advantages in a friendly manner, mutually exclusive with Power Diplomacy
Power Diplomacy — Era 2 — Increases diplomatic advantages in a strong manner, mutually exclusive with Goodwill Diplomacy
Land Hegemony — Era 3 — Increases bonuses for land power, mutually exclusive with Maritime Hegemony
Maritime Hegemony — Era 3 — Increases bonuses for sea power, mutually exclusive with Land Hegemony
Nationwide Urbanization — Era 3 — Increases population growth speed in all locations nationwide
Nationwide Urbanization Efficiently — Era 5 — Greatly increases population growth speed in all locations nationwide
Economic Development — Era 5 — Provides significant economic bonuses, mutually exclusive with Political Development and Cultural Development
Political Development — Era 5 — Provides significant political bonuses, mutually exclusive with Economic Development and Cultural Development
Cultural Development — Era 5 — Provides significant cultural bonuses, mutually exclusive with Economic Development and Political Development

The balance of this mod is poor, and due to the game's own architecture, it is not compatible with old save files

Supports Chinese, Japanese, and English. Since the 3_cabinet_actions_unlocks file has been modified, it is incompatible with any mod that also changes this file.
